articles.title: Video: US drone technology is ending up in Russia's hands - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Nic Robertson shows how Western technology used in drones is helping Russia to track and kill Ukrainian forces.

articles.author: Jason Morris
articles.title: Judge blocks Georgia DA from developing case against Republican state senator in Trump investigation
articles.description: A Georgia judge on Monday blocked Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis from investigating Burt Jones, a Republican state senator, as part of the investigation into efforts by former President Donald Trump and his allies to overturn the 2020 presidentia…
articles.content: (CNN)A Georgia judge on Monday blocked Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis from investigating Burt Jones, a Republican state senator, as part of the investigation into efforts by former Presi… [+1182 chars]

articles.title: Monkeypox concern level is a 10, US health secretary says. Why Biden admin hasn't declared a public health emergency - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Poppy Harlow presses US Health and Human Services Secretary Xavier Becerra over his concern level of the monkeypox outbreak and why the Biden administration has yet to declare a public health emergency.

articles.author: Josh Pennington, Darya Tarasova and Stephanie Busari, CNN
articles.title: Russia tries to blame West for food shortages as Lavrov rallies support on Africa tour
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has arrived in the Republic of Congo, the second stop on his Africa tour where he is aiming to seek support amid global anger over food shortages following Moscow's blockade of vital Ukrainian ports.
articles.content: (CNN)Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has arrived in the Republic of Congo, the second stop on his Africa tour where he is aiming to seek support amid global anger over food shortages following… [+4250 chars]

articles.author: Faith Karimi, CNN
articles.title: Some people in the US are rushing to get sterilized after the Roe v. Wade ruling
articles.description: In the wake of the reversal of the federal right to an abortion, gynecologists say they have seen an increase in women and non-binary people requesting tubal ligation -- more commonly referred to as tying tubes.

articles.author: Analysis by Nic Robertson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Russia's Odesa attack shows its true colors after grain export deal
articles.description: Russian missile strikes on Odesa port show Ukraine grain deal has changed nothing in Moscow's calculus for fighting the war, Nic Robertson writes.

articles.author: By Kathleen Magramo, Tara Subramaniam, Aditi Sangal, Mike Hayes and Meg Wagner, CNN
articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Russia said it used "high precision" missiles to destroy "military infrastructure," in  Odesa, leading to anger and concern over the future of a deal to allow the resumption of vital grain exports from Ukrainian ports. Follow live news updates here.
articles.content:
Russian state-owned energy company Gazprom says it will have to further reduce gas flow through the Nord Stream 1 pipeline on Wednesday as it halts another turbine for repairs.
This comes days after… [+2835 chars]

articles.author: Keith Allen and Steve Forrest, CNN
articles.title: Mother identifies son as one of two Americans killed in Ukraine's Donbas region
articles.description: One of the two American citizens who recently died in the Donbas region of Ukraine has been identified as Luke Lucyszyn, his mother told CNN.
